verses.text: \w Moreover|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w*. \w officers|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w* \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w ministry|strong="H5656"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Idithun: \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5030"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* psalteries, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w* \w according|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w serving|strong="H5656"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* appointed \w office|strong="H5656"\w*.
